keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.

unmap h
unmap j
unmap k
unmap l
unmap ñ
unmap H
unmap J
unmap K
unmap L
unmap Ñ

map J goBack
map K  previousTab
map L nextTab
map Ñ goForward

map k scrollDown
map l scrollUp
map j scrollLeft
map ñ scrollRight
searchEngines:
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s

i2e: https://translate.google.com/#en/es/%s
f2e: https://translate.google.com/#fr/es/%s
p2e: https://translate.google.com/#pr/es/%s
e2i: https://translate.google.com/#es/en/%s
e2f: https://translate.google.com/#es/fr/%s
e2p: https://translate.google.com/#es/pr/%s

gr: https://www.goodreads.com/search?q=%s
lb: https://letterboxd.com/search/%s
